alert.note: Alert for Habersham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Habersham County through 330 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clarkesville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarkesville, Demorest, Mount Airy and Hollywood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
